actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to limit to 5 years the period in which State and local educational agencies may be held accountable to the Federal Government for the use of equipment purchased with funds from programs administered by the Office of Education.

summary.text: Limits to five years the period in which State and local educational agencies may be held accountable to the Federal Government for the use of equipment purchased with funds from programs administered by the Office of Education.

titles.title: A bill to limit to 5 years the period in which State and local educational agencies may be held accountable to the Federal Government for the use of equipment purchased with funds from programs administered by the Office of Education.
